Mexico and threatening not to sign a new continental free trade agreement with the United states unless Washington lifts steel and aluminum tariffs on Mexico and Canada Dan carbon chunk reports this ultimatum came from a senior Mexican officials during a visit to Ottawa
Won Carlos Baker is Mexico's deputy commerce minister he says officials from all three countries are preparing the final text of the United states and Mexico Canada agreement
